tags: None
review: **** **** ****** *** ***** ***** ***** **** We were in doubt to keep the foetus she guides us so well.Now my son is 2 years old all thanks to doctor. My pregancy went so well and problem free just because of the doctor Mayur. So soft spoken, explains issues and medicines and their regime so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Dass has been a wonderful doctor and mentor during my entire journey of pregnancy from day 1 . I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude for your exceptional care and expertise during the delivery of our precious baby .Your dedication and skill made all the difference, ensuring a safe and successful delivery for both me and my baby. 

Your calming presence and reassuring words throughout the entire process were immensely comforting, easing any anxiety and instilling confidence in your abilities. Your commitment to providing the highest standard of care is truly commendable, and we feel incredibly fortunate to have had you as our obstetrician.
I can say in East Delhi she is the best obstretrician for many reason - very positive attitude , motivating all the way , caring like a family member rather than a random patient , her words are so humble and polite all he way & she always tries her best to co-ordinate & sort out every piece of issues (i like this the most) .

Words can't adequately convey our appreciation for everything Dr.Dass has done for us. Thank you for your unwavering support, compassion, and professionalism. You have played an integral role in bringing our little miracle into the world, and for that, we will be forever grateful.Thank you for going above and beyond to ensure the safety and well-being of both me and my baby. Your commitment to excellence is truly inspiring, and we feel incredibly fortunate to have had you by our side during this incredible journey into parenthood.

I've never ever searched for any alternatives ( in the beginning / mid way ) as I feel she is the best doctor for me whom I'm consulting . 

With deepest gratitude and admiration,
Chinmayee

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
Firstly, me and my husband are jointly writing this review post 4.5 months of our baby girl's birth as we both don't want to loose out on the opportunity to thank Dr Mayur Dass mam for the exceptional way in which she handled our challenges which arose as the time passed during the 8.5 months of my pregnancy.

We reached out to her post an extensive online search on various online platforms and booked our first appointment during the first week of the 3rd trimester.

With complications such as RH negative pregnancy, Low lying placenta, Thyroid we reached out to her and we found out that she understood the issues and points which we wanted to highlight during our first meet.

She went through all the case history related documents and test reports thoroughly and suggested the way forward.

The suggestions and pro-active approach which she took during the last 2.5 months of pregnancy were completely exceptional.

During the last week of my delivery I even became Covid positive and my MRI report showed that there might be chances of Accreta/Inccreta for which she made sure that she had the entire team of doctors whose inputs might be required during my planned OT session.

She knows exactly how to treat and make sure you are fully satisfied!!!

Very supportive and experienced and not at all inclined towards money or gives test after test. 

We thank her from bottom of our heart for accepting our case.

If you can get her for treatment , don’t think twice...!! Your baby will be in safe hands...!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My wife was pregnant and we visited Dr Mayur Dass after reading her reviews last year in 2021 like you are doing now.  We met her at her Vasundra enclave clinic during the same time,  I must say  Mayur Dass ma'am is an excellent doctor and always available for her patients either in-person and on WhatsApp or just a call way. Even at late nights or early mornings too, she will definitely pick your call and reply to your whats app queries when online.

She sometimes do scold you as an elder sister which is always welcome as we being a novice in this field so asking basic questions was acceptable since this was our 1st child and there is a different excitement in us and our family.

She is always supportive, polite and would clear your doubts patiently with no hurry of seeing more patients in queue . 

Our baby is 6 months old now, we still do meet her sometimes at her  clinic or cloud9 hospital to wish her which is always a wonderful experience. 

I will definitely recommend this doctor to everyone who is reading my comments singing off .

I will give her ****** (6 stars/5 stars ).

Thanks & Regards,
Baby Anayra Kapur  
Rakhi Kapur &
Anirudh Kapur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Parenthood is very exciting period in one’s life and before that phase there is a period when you decide on ‘The Best Doctor’. Our’s second baby born this month and I am sharing a review for Dr Mayur that could help aspiring parents to make an informed decision in selecting a doctor. 

1. Dr Mayur has a very enriched experience and an excellent pedigree. She is always approachable and answer to all your queries patiently 

2. I believe for any person a ‘Doctor - Patient’ connect is pertinent and Dr Mayur always provide that emotional connect. There were occasions when she has gone beyond her call of duty and even counselled us as well. I think that’s a great service behaviour in this noble profession 

3. We felt, Dr Mayur don’t ask for multiple visits unless it is absolutely required and that could give you sense of trust and satisfaction 


Whether you have an ailment or you are an expecting/aspiring parents then I would strongly recommend you to visit Dr Mayur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Mayur Das is an amazing Doctor **** **** ** ***** *** ** ********* I and my wife went to her clinic for Pregnancy consultation and delivery. Throughout the process, she gave us lot of time to answer our questions, we never felt rushed and tge friendly nature of her is the best part. She genuinely seems to care about her each patients like a family member. My wife was very much keen for normal delivery and she assured us for that and it actully happened. She was very much concern for a normal then us. At the time of delivery as well she was present all the time for consultation and care. Even her Clinic was nicely maintained and well organized as well. 

We really liked her treatment and we will cwrtainly  refer her to all of our friends and family.  Dr. Mayur  is very down-to-earth, a great listener and have solution of all the problems. She was even available at 5 early morning for us and sometime very late night as well on calls which was a great releif for us.

WE HIGHLY AND VERY STRONGLY RECOMMEND DR.MAYUR DAS TO ALL.

Thank you once again Doctor

Regards
Lalita and Sumit Tiwari

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ***** ** * **** **** **** She clears all the doubts very calmly listen to us with very patience. She is just one call away . Always reply’s on time for any query. She handle my all delivery anxiety very well and supported me all the time. Very happy to start my motherhood journey by being in safe hands 😘😇

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I highly recommend Dr. Mayur Dass, *** ** **** ************* friendly and treats her patient with humanity. Although, we were assured for the normal delivery but, there was some complication which Dr. Dass handled very intelligently and calmly and my wife gave birth to a little baby boy with the cesarean. My baby and my wife both are happy & healthy.

I and my wife are very much satisfied with the doctor and would love to recommend Dr. Dass to our friends and loved ones who are on the beautiful journey of giving birth to a new life.  :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am writing this review from the core of my heart , i never write comments but  some persons deserve. I have seen many doctors but she is the real one who cares for patient. We are from himachal and visited cloudnine hospital patparghanj on my first pregnancy time *** * *** *** * **** *** *** ** *** **** ** ** ***** ** **** Treatment comes later but what i like about her is understanding towards your concerns. Due to some financial issues cant treat further but yes many thanks mam for your wonderful treatment and may god bless you with all the happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am blessed with a baby girl three weeks back. The way Dr. Mayur Dass handled my entire pregnancy and delivery was commendable. She never asked for unnecessary tests/scans.She was always available for all my queries. From the beginning she guided me to follow a healthy lifestyle and focused totally on normal delivery. During labor pain I lost hope and insisted on surgery but it was her who encouraged me throughout the process and I delivered my baby normally. I highly recommend her to those who wants a friendly and affectionate doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mayur Dass is a very humble person and an excellent doctor. I visited her for my pregnancy and from the start to end, she guided us very well. There were times when I had a lot of problems, but thanks to Dr. Mayur Dass, who didn't left us alone. She stood like a friend and solved our each and every query. She didn't forcefully impose her any decision on us.The best thing, we liked about her is, that we earlier only heard that she recommends and promotes NVD, but for us, she proved the same by helping me with my normal delivery. Both I and baby are healthy after the process.Thank God, that our case was handled by such a nice person. In today's date, it is hard to find a genuine and humble doctor like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: We visited Dr. Mayur regarding pregnancy. She guided as very well throughout pregnancy and prescribed only required medicines. As my wife developed complications (BP Problems) and fell in the bathroom during later stage of pregnancy; she has to be operated upon. Doctor not only came to the hospital early morning (5 am). She managed to save lives of both my wife ( as she lost 6units blood) & baby as well. I am thankful to Almighty God we chose to visit her in the first place. She is not only a wonderful doctor but a great human being🙂. She is always approachable to us and helpful in mitigating even smallest of our doubts. Now our baby is almost of 2months and keeping fine. Thanks Doctor for everything 🙏🙏. May God Shower his choicest blessings upon u and ur family👪.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you Dr Mayur for everything.. 
Initially I hardly visited the clinic due to covid and used to consult online only.. She never asked for visit until necessarily.. There have been so many sayings from different family members on what to eat and what not and I used to ask her.. She never stopped me to eat anything except papaya.. Just that moderation is the key.. I had all the fruits being a fruit lover.. and Mangoes too in summers and I delivered a healthy baby... Thanks to her.. 
Though we tried our best, I had a c-section.. I wish Max Parpadganj has the technology of delivering baby though vacuum... I do had the complications in stitches for some reason but Dr Mayur was always there 24/7.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),
review: My experience with Dr. Mayur Dass has been really nice. My entire pregnancy journey has been very smooth and comfortable under her guidance. She listens to all your doubts patiently and explains everything in detail. She never suggests expensive tests unless important and never misleads. Her friendly and humble approach vanishes off all your worries instantly. My delivery was also done by her with utmost care and I did not face any problem at all. Thank you so much Mayur mam, wish you all good. ☺️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are very thankful to have consulted Dr Mayur Dass. We went to her clinic for Pregnancy consultation and delivery. She is very accessible and always listened and answered to our little little queries with patience. Her words and assurances greatly helped us in our anxious moments. Many times she guided us on phone at odd hours. If she was not able to take our call she would call back later. At the time of delievery she was present all the time and ensured proper post delivery care was given.

Thank you so much ma'am. Would strongly recommend Dr Dass to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ***** **** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ****** She is very polite and friendly.I visited for my second pregnancy and she guided very well throughout my pregnancy. I got a healthy baby by normal delivery. My first baby was also delivered normally with the help of Dr Mayur. She puts all her efforts to avoid C Section. Many thanks to Dr. Mayur Dass.  100% recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Mayur Dass during 9th month of my wife pregnancy and in one visit we felt like we have been knowing her from years . Her ********* *** behaviour is out of our expectations. I thoroughly thank God that we met Mayur mam and she supported so well in our baby delivery. I strongly recommend Dr. Mayur Dass to all .Dr Mayur mam, thanks a lot from the bottom of our heart from me ,my wife and our baby.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Mayur Das is very friendly and generous. 
She described everything in detail.. 
At Every visit she has given me  and my wife positive approach. She tried to give her best and she made it without operation.
I am very satisfied with her talking way, suggesting way and her genuine concerns.
She made my baby without operation that was a challenging some time but she has caliber to do this.

Heartly Thanks to Dr. Mayur Das....
Hope you will be always rock....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One word to describe Dr. Mayur would be Amazing.Having her taking care of our Pregnancy Case was a blessing for us.  She is extremely sweet, listens to your queries patiently and answers them all, ensuring you are completely content. Dr. Mayur will spend ample time with you and ensure you are happy & satisfied before you go back home*** ********* ** *** **** *** ** Go To for your pregnancy cases... even if you have to travel 15kms (one-side) to consult her, do it blindly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you Dr. Mayur Dass for teaching me the difference between Fact and Faith: Fact is when any ordinary doctor diagnoses illness in a report. Faith is when good doctors like you give their patients the strength to recover. Thanks for showing me so much care and concern.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I really like the Dr Behavior. She is very caring. 
She examined all the aspects carefully and listen all the small things.
She also gave a brief explanation on all the doubts.
She is also available on phone call and always eager to help her patient.
She called me on phone and asked about my condition and tried to give me some courage to handle the situation.

I didn't feel that I am talking with a doctor but I felt that she is my elder sister.
Thanks a lot Doctor .

:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Mayur  was exceedingly kind and patient. It was a pleasure to speak to such a knowledgeable member of the medical field! My queries were heard and addressed efficiently. The follow-up also hit the mark! I feel thoroughly satisfied with my experience and would recommend it to one and all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Normal Delivery,
review: **** ******* * highly qualified doctor. We had our first baby in Dr. Mayur Dass's observation & consultation. She is a wonderful person & most humane in nature which distinguished her from other experienced doctors around. I wish her good luck & recommend  her to anyone who needs help in gynae & delivery process.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Unlike many other doctors, she is very down to earth and not intimidating at all. 

Follow up is open for 5 days....So that she could evaluate if medicine was ok or needed change.

Asked only for necessary tests and didn't push for getting non essential tests and procedures like many other doctors around here whose marketing pitch discourages or scares patients.

also Very Punctual.

100% satisfaction

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited for Pregnancy

Amazing, Intelligent, Supportive and Calm... these are her qualities which made our 9th months journey an amazing experience . She supported us both physically and mentally. She was always available on whatsapp or over call. She handled last minute complications with great care and has always encouraged us for normal delivery.  

I will surely recommend her. Thank you mam for all love and support. It was great dealing with you. :-) :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mayur Dass is well educated, experienced, confident and kind hearted, thats what makes her a perfect Doctor. I don't have words to express my gratitude towards Dr. Mayur Dass. *** ** ** **** **** ***** ** **.She did not only made our 9 month journey pleasant but she also handled last moment complications very intelligently and saved us from cesarean delivery.I Will highly recommend to family and friends.

tags: Wait time,
review: We were at Max at 2.30 pm as we had an appointment at 2.40 . Doc was busy at operation theatre. Waited her till 5.30 but she was still not there.So came back. We understand that there could be emergency👍🏻 but my only concern is that we should have informed earlier.. that’s all.
reply_text:
Sorry for inconvenience 
But how emergency can be informed earlier.I was there in Max OT theatre only and doing emergency surgery . Many times emergencies don’t give us enough time to think anything else except about our patient on OT table especially for obstetrician as we are dealing with 2 lifes . I came in Opd after finishing surgery and was there in Opd till 7 pm and saw all remaining patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** ****** ******* ****** *** Dr. Mayur is very methodical and explains everything clearly. My wife's consulting Dr. Mayur for problem she's facing with Conceiving. We are totally hopeful to have the positive result soon.  The best part is, Dr. Mayur is empathetic and never pushes us to go for the assisted pregnancy methods. 5/5 ...

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Mayur Daas is fantastic and very friendly , we got baby after 11 years. She is so intelligent and handled our pregnancy very smartly. We lost the hope but Dr Mayur gives a hope of ray. Our cases is very complicated because my wife was struggling with very high sugar and BP. Big thanks to Dr Mayur. I never saw such kind of doctor in my life. She is excellent.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Mayur in her clinic for pre-pregnancy counselling 2 months after my unfortunate abortion. To start with, the wait time was huge, the clinic was a very confined space with no privacy from other patients waiting outside while we discussed our case with the doctor.  Secondly, after listening to my case, she reacted in a very un-empathatic way and scared us a lot for what all bad can happen to us again for the next pregnancy, and provided a list of many tests (worth around 40K) to be done in her lab next door, and to start the medications. I was so distressed after the appointment, she almost made me cry with all the negativity she shared. Thankfully we did not go ahead with her suggestion and visited another very senior doctor in Cloudnine, who advised us correctly and was helpful unlike her.

tags: None
review:
Mrs. Mayur Das is an amazing Dr. I went to her clinic for Pregnancy consultation and delivery . Throughout the process, she gave me lot of time to answer my questions, I never felt rushed.  *** ********* * ******** ********* * She genuinely seems to care about her patients. I was very keen for normal delivery and she assured me for that. Dr. Mayur's Clinic was nicely maintained and well organized as well. 

I liked her treatment and I refer her to all of my friends and colleagues.  Dr. Mayur  is very down-to-earth, a great listener and Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
We consulted Dr Mayur Dass during Pregnancy and Delivery. We came to know about Dr Mayur Dass at the start of 7th month. We found, her way of diagnosis, suggestions,counselling suiting to us, since she always let ourselves open and encouraged us to ask whatever doubt we were having in our mind. She is very polite and was always reachable on call, chat during whole period.

Doctor has already told us that there is a better chance of normal delivery. At the time of delivery we were very panicked & nervous and were thinking about operation but Dr Mayur handled the whole situation wonderfully and we were gifted with a baby boy, by the blessing of the God, in Dec-2020 through Normal Delivery. Post delivery also the Doctor was always reachable and guided properly. Besides being an expert doctor she is also a nice person. Thanks a lot to Doctor
Mayur ma’am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Mayur Dass is very helpful gynac.Not only she  calmly listened to all problems but also She was always genuine with her advice.we never felt any discomfort as she was just a call away  on call even in this pandemic situation.My wife delivered a baby with normal conditions which wasn't possible without her.*** ** **** ************* ******* we are so fortunate to have a doctor like her.firstly, we visited another gyno who suggested us for cesarean due to low placenta. we consult dr Mayur dass regarding our doubt in the 8th month. nd she examined that there's no low lying placenta nd normal delivery can be done successfully. we blessed a baby boy by normal delivery.Thank you so much doctor ❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited for Pre and Post Delivery CareVisited for Pre and Post Delivery Care, Gynae related concerns and full contraceptive services.It's always pleasure to meet Dr.Mayur Dass from the first appointment till delivery and after also . She is an excellent doctor and I always feel very comfortable when I visit her. She is the only doctor who boost my confidence level and prepared me mentally strong . The kind of confidence she shows in you is remarkable . Her nature is too friendly to undranstand our concerns and provided solution accordingly.She is warm and loving every time ,I would like to suggest to others also to consult Dr. Mayur Dass whenever required. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't have words to express my gratitude towards Dr. Mrs. Mayur Dass. For us (me & my wife), she is next to "God". We visited her clinic with multiple problems like high blood pressure, thyroid problem & the biggest and scary one, "chroid plexus cyst" in my 22-24 weeks baby's head. Before visiting her, we visited several specialists, but none of them able to help us. But Dr. Mayur Dass not only assured us to get better treatment but also promised to us that she will give us a healthy baby if we follow her instructions. We followed word to word as she said. And finally she gave us a healthy baby boy in our lap. She is amazing!! Thank you so much ma'am. May God gives to everything in your life what you want. 1000% recommended. 😀😁
